    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3964</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Addome - uomo - puzzle</string>
            <string language="en">Abdomen - man - puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abdomen - Mann - Puzzlespiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abdomen - homme - puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abdômen - homem - enigma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοιλία - άτομο - γρίφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abdomen - hombre - rompecabezas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un piccolo puzzle dell'addome degli uomini. Riesci a mettere tutti gli organi nel posto giusto?</string>
            <string language="en">A small puzzle about men's abdomen. Do you manage to get all the organs in the right place.</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kleines Puzzlespiel über Abdomen der Männer.
Handhaben Sie, alle Organe im rechten Platz zu erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un petit puzzle au sujet de l'abdomen des hommes.
Vous parvenez à obtenir tous les organes dans le bon endroit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um enigma pequeno sobre o abdômen dos homens. 
Você controla começar todos os órgãos no lugar direito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας μικρός γρίφος για την κοιλία των ατόμων. 
Κατορθώνετε να πάρετε όλα τα όργανα στη σωστή θέση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un rompecabezas pequeño sobre el abdomen de los 
hombres. Usted maneja conseguir todos los órganos en el lugar 
derecho.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
